_sText:
Original thread of first version of this map:
http://plaguefest.com/threads/zm_winter_escape_qr_v1.20907/

Map Description

  • ze_winter_helicopter is a warehouse-themed map.
  • Old version was not that good, so this is a remake.
  • This map is inspired by ATIX panic.
  • This map combines both ZM aspects (barricading), and ZE aspects (escaping).
  • It has 64 player spawns, some spots to barricade, or to hold.

Building Structure

  • There are 8 rooms (barricading or defending spot) that humans can choose.
  • Each room has an escape door that opens after a certain amount of time, like ATIX Panic, and it serves as a path to the roof.
  • There are 2 levels of roof, the taller roof and lower roof. The taller roof is the part of the roof that has the staircase to the helicopter. The lower roof is the part of the roof has a ladder that can be accessed by humans in the beginning of the round. So, it can act as a defending spot too.

Gameplay Flow

Humans
  • Humans start by picking rooms to defend/barricade for a certain amount of time.
  • After that certain amount of time, the escape door opens. Humans have 30 seconds to escape to the taller roof.
  • Humans must defend the taller roof from two different entry points: the staircase they used, and the lower roof, for a specified amount of time.
  • Humans must be careful to not get too close with zombies' special teleport spot. (It is slightly visible in the screenshot, but everyone can clearly see it in-game)
  • After that specified amount of time, the humans can enter the helicopter and prepare last 20 seconds defense before the helicopter departs.
  • Helicopter departs, human wins.

Zombies
  • Attack humans in the barricading/defending spot.
  • After the escape door opens, zombies can try to enter the building through another entrance (behind the helicopter pillar).
  • Zombies now must attack humans in the taller roof. They can rush to the entry point, or just use the secret teleport hidden somewhere in the map.

Changelog (v1 to v2)

  • The entire map layout is completely different. Rather than lila panic-like buildings, I made a whole new building structure.
  • Barricading & defending spots are completely different.
  • There are no more teleports in the helicopter, but there are secret teleporters to the roof for zombies.
  • Helicopter has been changed, I decided to use the prefab made by AuroraF: https://gamebanana.com/prefabs/2742

If there are bugs in the map, please notify me and i'll try to fix it.
